dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: EventScape is a large scale, synthetic dataset recorded in the CARLA simulator. It contains 743 sequences of driving data with a total of 171,000 labels, equivalent to around 2 hours of driving. It includes events, intensity frames, semantic labels, depth maps, and vehicle navigation parameters in diverse automotive scenes.
dcterms:title: EventScape

dcterms:creator: A. Z. Zhu
D. Thakur
T. Ozaslan
B. Pfrommer
V. Kumar
K. Daniilidis
dcterms:description: The MVSEC dataset consists of data recorded using two DAVIS event cameras with a resolution of 346 × 260 pixels in a stereo rig, together with measurements from a LiDAR for ground truth depth. It features several day and night-time driving sequences as well as indoor sequences recorded on a quadcopter.
dcterms:title: MVSEC
